name: EAGLES
description: EAGLES is a next-generation meme project built on Solana, blending internet humor, AI interactivity, and gamified community rewards. At its core, EAGLES celebrates meme culture with the bold slogan “Let’s Make Eagles Great Again,” but goes further by introducing AI-powered experiences at ai.eagles.wtf. Here, users can chat with witty AI Eagle Roasters that humorously roast other memecoins, earn points through interactions, and redeem them in daily lotteries or climb leaderboards in the flight altitude game. Unlike traditional meme coins, EAGLES transforms memes into living, interactive experiences—powered by AI, enhanced through gamification, and sustained by community participation. The result is a unique AI Meme ecosystem where humor, culture, and crypto converge.
